subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=闲}}
Related to {{och-l|闌|railing; balustrade}}, {{och-l|欄|fence; railing}} and {{och-l|攔|to obstruct}}, and perhaps related to {{och-l|練|to train}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). External comparanda may include {{cog|my|ရန်း||to erect railings, barriers}} or {{cog|lus|khâr||to shut; to close; to shut off}} ([[ibid]].).

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|不閑|心閑|明媚閑雅|熟閑|舉止閑冶|閑邪存誠|蕩檢踰閑|防閑|閑雅|踰閑蕩檢|踰閑}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text: Probably cognate with {{och-l|介|to increase; to become great}} and perhaps derived from {{och-l|嘏|large; great}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
